name: Flower Life
description:
What is the flower Life?  Embark in an  platformer adventure journey  as a beautiful  flower looking  for water to growth at  the spring season.  Flower life can be sometimes difficult and dangerous. Sheep loves to eat flowers. Will you help  the flowers get her essential water drops  to survive or  you prefer being  foods for the sheep?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As developer, this game jam  was  great  to experiment 2d lighting with normal map,  game animation with timeline ,  small battle state in limited space, and so much more, ... I had fun with the stereo sound, left ,right...it gives a cool effect for sounds.   I' m glad to play all your games soon.  Please leave a comment about what you like  or what could be improved  so I can progress ;). Thanks to  the super cool jam community to inspire me ;)
